text: Adolescence is a 1966 French short documentary film directed by Marin Karmitz. It was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Documentary Short. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1966 films Category:1966 documentary films Category:1966 short films Category:French films Category:French-language films Category:French documentary films Category:Films directed by Marin Karmitz Category:Short documentary films Category:Documentary films about adolescence
title: Adolescence (film)
